title: Ring of Fire - October 19 2013
description:
October 19, 2013
Ring of Fire 
Hosted by Robert F. Kennedy Jr., Mike Papantonio and Sam Seder


This week on Ring of Fire Radio: Thom Hartmann will join us to talk about his new documentary The Last Hours of Humanity.

Senator Sheldon Whitehouse will tell us why the government shutdown completely backfired on Republicans.

Journalist and author Alex Zaitchik will discuss the new tactics being used by the gun industry to push firearms on American citizens.

And weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll hear from a whistleblower who has uncovered evidence the BP is using online trolls to harass oil spill victims.
